body_html: I'm going to mark this as contributions welcome since there are some subtleties that I don't have time to investigate at the moment. I'd be happy to review PRs if anyone wants to tackle this. The subtlety is that I'm not sure what the ideal default should be.

body: I'm going to mark this as contributions welcome since there are some subtleties that I don't have time to investigate at the moment.  I'd be happy to review PRs if anyone wants to tackle this.  The subtlety is that  I'm not sure what the ideal default should be.
